title: What are the two types of definition? - Quora

response.answer_text: A description or a shortened way of expressing something.Operational Definition: Used in the sciences: You want to study hunger, but you have no idea of whether the monkey is hungry. So you operationally define hunger as being without food for 24 hours. Are the monkeys hungry? Maybe. A person who eats food regularly would be hungry (most likely). A person with anorexia, for example, who hasn’t eaten for two days would probably not be hungry (as in 24 hours without their regular intake of food because there is not a regular intake of food).
